item.description:
Bamboo Circle Kick-off Event
Tuesday, February 8, 2011, 6:30 - 8:30 pm

Hong Kong Restaurant

1238 Mass Avenue, Cambridge

Join us as we present BCNC's newly formed Bamboo Circle (http://www.bcnc.net/i....
php/bamboo-circle.html), a young professionals group created to support Boston's Asian immigrant and Asian American community. The night will include an overview of BCNC's programs, mingling with like-minded individuals, hors d'oeuvres, a cash bar with drink specials and a raffle!

details, details, details . . .
There is a $10 suggested donation and all proceeds support the BCNC Youth Center. Raffle prizes include restaurant gift certificates, an autographed Jeremy Lin rookie card, and two tickets to the upcoming BCNC annual banquet worth $100 each.

Contact joann.yung@bcnc.net or 617-635-5129 x1054 for more information.

Special thanks to our host, Hong Kong Restaurant - http://www.hongkongha...
.com/

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Join BCNC's newly formed Bamboo Circle (young professionals)
